query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Chi poria mai pur con parole sciolte 2 dicer del sangue e de le piaghe a pieno 3 ch’i’ ora vidi, per narrar più volte?
query.error: **English:** 1 Who could ever, even with unfettered words, 2 fully tell of the blood and the wounds 3 that I saw there, to recount them many times?
query.result: 1 Kaḥ śaknoti kadācid api vāgbhiḥ pramuktaiḥ 2 kathanaṃ kartum rakta-vrana-pūrṇasya 3 yad adya apaśyam, punar api varṇayitum?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 Ogne lingua per certo verria meno 5 per lo nostro sermone e per la mente 6 c’hanno a tanto comprender poco seno.
query.error: **English:** 4 Surely every tongue would fail 5 because of our speech and our minds, 6 which have too little capacity to comprehend so much.
query.result: 4 Sarvā eva vāg api niścitam kṣīyate sma 5 asmākam vāṇyā manasā ca 6 yayoḥ asti etāvat paryāptaṃ jñānam.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 31 Paśya yathā Muḥammadaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ asti! 32 Mama puras tasya Aliḥ rudan gacchati, 33 mukhe śikhāyāḥ mūlāt oṣṭhapattam api khaṇḍitaḥ asti.
